greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: RATS: Reverse Add Then Sort the digits applied to previous term, starting with 3.
link: R. K. Guy, Conway's RATS and other reversals, Amer. Math. Monthly, 96 (1989), 425-428.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, RATS Sequence
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1).
formula: Let a(n) = k, form m by Reversing the digits of k, Add m to k Then Sort the digits of the sum into increasing order to get a(n+1).
mathematica: f[k_] := Module[{m = FromDigits[Reverse[IntegerDigits[k]]]}, FromDigits[ Sort[ IntegerDigits[k + m]]]]; NestList[f, 3, 50] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 18 2011 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 19 2002
